Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: If you are a black person please don't come here, it will be traumatic. One of the bartenders called the police on us simply because we asked him how to reserve a table (given the understandable COVID restrictions). Once the police came he told them that we were welcome to come back. Really disturbing and racist person. Sad experience.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: I cannot recommend this place. The staff was incredibly unfriendly and intrusive, which made me feel very upset. My friends and I will not come again.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text:
Good tables, limited beers and snacks. Lacking a bit of ambiance.
Come here to play not for the bar

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great professional pool tables, nice ambience, nice beers. Make sure to reserve your table though!

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: The bartender is crazy. He doesn't know how to handle a customer. He is so aggressive and racist. Please try to find another place. Don't waste your time.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great pool club, relaxed atmosphere and good service. Great fun.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great place but the only disadvantage is they don't take credit cards which caught us out. Staff are awesome.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: This place is so great for pool and darts and boardgames as well! The only thing dampening the mood is the staff, who are all quite rude to people who don't know their rules yet. I understand if you can't walk with your beer around the ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: I came here for darts and was not disappointed. They have like 8 boards, all nice ones, electronic scoring for 501, and just a cool vibe. The bartender was super friendly as well and they have a great local beer selection. As an American it ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Cozy and straightforward. You've got your pool tables, dart boards, bar, and even a pinball machine! Only downside was the constant interruption by some of the staff who kept going around all the tables to tell everyone to keep their ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: I really wanted to give a 4 star review. Yet after the treatment I received I was even considering giving 1 stars. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Spacious area to enjoy some pool games. The place has a lot of tables, however, all were taken when we visited. Wait time was about 10-15 min. Inside there are multiple TVs broadcasting different sports matches, which made the wait at least OK. Also, staff is friendly and helpful.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Absolutely rude staff, they charged me what had been already paid by the person leaving before me. I was sipping my cider about 10 inches away from the table when I saw an angry woman hurrying towards me. Then she started screaming at me ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: This was a really nice, good tables, lots of them and really friendly staff. This is what I have been looking for in Amsterdam. Maybe a bit further away than the usual tourist haunts but if enjoy the game and want to play then it had to be here. Darts also available

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: If it was possible I would definetly rate this with a 0. Incredible rude staff. The barman doesn't know the difference between "outside of the bar" and "the hallway of the bar". My friend and I take the beer on the hallway and when he ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: I am talking Pool lessons there so a regular visitor. Plenty of pool tables and also lots of dart boards if that tickles your fancy. Would recommend it on a night out.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: If I could I would rate with 0 stars. I have never seen more idiotic people than the ones there. Not only one but both of the people in the service was extremely rude, and completely unreasonable. The pools were good, but with such a service I wouldn‚Äôt suggest it not even to my worst enemy! Never go!!

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: In my opinion the best pool bar in Amsterdam. They have a large amount of good quality tables and cater for professionals as well as first timers. If you want to just come and have a drink there is a large bar with extremely friendly staff and rnough seating for a chilled time.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Superb venue with a great overall atmosphere. Nice owner, helpful & friendly staff. Perfect for a nice game of pool, snooker or darts. Also hosts regular poker tourneys, without any rake or fees! Whish there were more places like this!

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Very good tables, nice vibe and friendly staff!

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Very rude bartender (balding). Doesn't understand common courtesy or customer service. Instead of asking whether I'd like to buy a drink I'm greeted with "you need to buy a drink, this isn't a picknick terrace". ‚Ä¶

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great place, customer service amazing, very friendly and great atmosphere. Tables high quailty and fast paced. Overall best experience me and my partner have had in amsterdam in our 4 day visit. Santa and John x

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Found this pool hall after about 7 months living in Amsterdam (they seem quite hard to track down). Mellow atmosphere, super-friendly staff and excellent quality tables. Weighs in at about 11‚Ç¨ per hour, I think I'll end up being a regular there.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Amazing cafe. You can play pool for a low price. And darting is free you just have to buy consumptions. The tap beer is grolsch wich is not mt favorite. Then it would have got 5 stars in my opinion ;)

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great low-key spot for shooting pool, playing darts and drinking beer. The soundtrack generally seems to be 90's rock/grunge and some of the patrons are a bit on the scruffy side... I love it!

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Excellent place. The staff is really friendly and the tables are great. Highly recommend!

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Awesome pool hall! Both for the amatuers to have a good time and the more experienced players. Poolwise one of the best in the city with many active national teams playing under the roof of this club on many different levels. Both beginners and pros will find their opponents here:)

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Nice pool Hall, not only playing pool, but also dart, boardgames, card games and entertainment like, you can request your own play list for listening music.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: No-frills decor. Great tables. Decent rates. A place where I've spent far too much time and money - but with zero regret.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great place to play some pool or darts with a couple of friends. The staff is super nice and friendly. Would recommend to check this place out.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Nice pool hall. Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Recommended.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Professional pool tables. A bit pricey though. One hr on a table costs you 13.5 euros. Good for a group though.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great staff, chill place to have a beer or play some pool. Enough pool tables, have never had to wait.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: If you are looking for a pool bar with a nice atmosphere, service and beer - this is it:)

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Many tables, very hospitable bartender that even teaches you a few tricks if you're a begginer. A bit pricy 13.50‚Ç¨ per hour

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Good place to play some darts or pool for a good price. The pool tables and equipment are really good.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Great service, atmosphere and the place is clean. Theres room for everyone, tv's and other bar games such as darts.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: I know it's hard to believe, but they don't let black people in. We used to come here every week, but when my black friend came along, we got thrown out and almost beaten up by one of their thugs for no reason whatsoever. And I thought I've seen everything in Amsterdam...

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: The tables are abit dirty but not too bad, also has enough space around the tables.

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: Very bad service! The bartender (tall, skinny and bald) was rude and didnt seem to bother about the customers

Review Text: Good pool tables, but about the bills.... No talk!!!!

Review Text: Great tables, nice atmosphere- but avoid during warm weather!

Review Text:

Name: Pool Lokaal "De Gracht"
Review Text: It's always fun when I'm there. People are great, both employees and visitors!
